title: Entregador de Flor - Ao Vivo em Brasília
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Vai lá entregador de flor
lines.translation: Go ahead, flower delivery man!
lines.grammar: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das); Meaning: 'Go ahead, flower delivery man!'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Dar assistência pra isso
lines.translation: To provide assistance for that.
lines.grammar: dar, isso (1sg present); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'To provide assistance for that.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Que eu e ela tá chamando de amor
lines.translation: What she and I are calling love.
lines.grammar: chamando (1sg present); de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das); Meaning: 'What she and I are calling love.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E o coração se acostumou
lines.translation: And the heart got used to it.
lines.grammar: coração (1sg present), acostumou (common past ending); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'And the heart got used to it.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Que de sete em sete dias
lines.translation: That every seven days
lines.grammar: dias (2sg present); de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das); em + article contracts (no/na/nos/nas); Meaning: 'That every seven days'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Eu mando um novo, por que o outro murchou
lines.translation: I'm sending a new one because the other one went bad.
lines.grammar: mando (1sg present), novo (1sg present), outro (1sg present); por (cause/path); Meaning: 'I'm sending a new one because the other one went bad.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Pra não dar tempo dela me esquecer
lines.translation: So she doesn't have time to forget me.
lines.grammar: dar, tempo (1sg present), esquecer; watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'So she doesn't have time to forget me.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Toda semana eu mando um buquê
lines.translation: Every week I send a bouquet.
lines.grammar: mando (1sg present); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'Every week I send a bouquet.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Vou te encher de flor minha flor
lines.translation: I'm going to shower you with flowers, my flower.
